newsitem.title: ESTONIA: ESTONIA-TRADE DEFICIT RISES IN JUNE TO 1.8 BLN KROONS.
newsitem.headline: ESTONIA-TRADE DEFICIT RISES IN JUNE TO 1.8 BLN KROONS.

text.p: 1.84 billion kroons in June compared to May's deficit of 1.5
billion kroons, the statisitics office said on Tuesday.
ESTONIAN TRADE BALANCE June '97 May '97 June '96
Note -- All figures are in billions of kroons unless
